peekOfCode:
_lock = Lock()
def enable_file_backend(path: str) -> None:
    """Enable writing trace events to a newline-delimited JSON file."""
    global _file_path
    p = Path(path)
    p.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
    _file_path = p
def disable_backend() -> None:
    global _file_path
    _file_path = None

trace_block
peekOfCode:
def trace_block(name: str, *, tags: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, sample_rate: float = 1.0):
    """Context manager for tracing an arbitrary code block.
    Example:
        with trace_block("startup", tags={"phase":"init"}):
            do_startup()
    """
    start = time.perf_counter()
    extra = _get_context()
    if tags:
        extra.update(tags)

label: test_sync_trace
test_async_trace
test_trace_block
peekOfCode:
def test_trace_block():
    """Test trace_block context manager."""
    with trace_block("test_operation", tags={"test": True}):
        x = sum(range(100))
    assert x == 4950
def test_context():
    """Test context helpers."""
    token = set_context({"request_id": "test-123"})
    assert token is not None
    clear_context(token)
